import { useState } from 'react' import '../App.css' export function ContactMe() { const [name, setName] = useState("") const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const alert = name ? ("Thank you for your submission "+{name}+" , we will get back to you shortly") : ("Please provide all the necessary details") aler } return (
setName(e.target.value)}>
) }
